description: Sécurité Sociale Alimentaire (The Food Security Social) Initiative, based in Alsace, aims to establish a food security system rooted in mutuality principles. Operated by a local association with around 60 members, it focuses on redistributing monthly funds to citizens for food purchases, alongside educational programs on nutrition. The initiative also engages in advocacy and networking, collaborating with various partners, including universities and local governments, to promote sustainable food practices and empower communities in making informed dietary choices.
name: Sécurité Sociale Alimentaire
